Name: Seretse Khama
Reign: King of the BagammaNgwato people (1925); afterwards first President of Botswana (1966–1980)

Name: Sultan Ahmad Shah
Reign: King of Malaysia (1979–1984) and Sultan of Pahang (1979 onwards)

Name: Tuanku Abdul Halim
Reign: King of Malaysia (1970–1975) and Sultan of Kedah (1958 onwards)

Name: Tuanku Jaafar
Reign: King of Malaysia (1994–1999) and Yang di-Pertuan Besar of Negeri Sembilan (1968 onwards)
